directions: In a large pot, combine the tomato puree, water and green onions. Season with red pepper flakes. Set over medium heat and bring to a boil. Add rice and cook until tender, about 30 minutes. Add fish and simmer for 20 minutes. Season with salt and pepper.
ingredients: 2 tablespoons red pepper flakes, or to taste
1 pound catfish fillets, cut into 1 inch pieces
title: Red Fish Soup
